lead_paragraph: Brazil have invited Colombia to play a friendly match next month with proceeds from the game going to families of the Chapecoense players and staff killed in the Medellin air crash, a Brazilian Football Confederation (CBF) spokesman told Reuters on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Invite Colombia to Play in Chapecoense Charity Match
headline.main: Brazil Invite Colombia to Play in Chapecoense Charity Match
